cards.name: Sakuttomon
cards.effect2: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When you play another Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits by an effect, gain 1 memory.

cards.name: Zubamon
cards.effect1: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less, you may play it without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
cards.effect2: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

cards.name: ZubaEagermon
cards.effect1: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, detele 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
cards.effect2: [When Attacking] If you have a Digimon that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, detele 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

cards.name: Duramon
cards.effect1: [Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a card in your hand that's black or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
cards.effect2: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its DNA digivolve cost.

cards.name: Durandamon
cards.effect1:
[Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, this Digimon gets +3000 DP and gains <Security Attack +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.
[When Attacking] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
cards.effect2: [Your Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it doesn't activate [Security] effects on Option cards it checks.

cards.name: RagnaLoardmon
cards.effect1:
[When Digivolving] <Blitz> (If your opponent has 1 or more memory, this Digimon may attack).
When  DNA digivolving, for every 4 cards in this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with a play cost of 20 or less and trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.
[All Turns] (Once Per Turn) When a card is removed from a player's security stack, unsuspend this Digimon.

cards.name: Chikurimon
cards.effect1: [All Turns] Players can't reduce play costs.

cards.name: Ludomon
cards.effect1: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less, you may play it without paying its memory cost. Add the rest to your hand.
cards.effect2: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains <Blocker> (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead).

cards.name: TiaLudomon
cards.effect1: [On Play] By placing this Digimon under 1 of your other Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits as its bottom digivolution card, 1 of your Digimon gains <Reboot> (Unsuspend this Digimon during your opponent's unsuspend phase) until the end of your opponent's next turn.
cards.effect2: [Opponent's Turn] While you have a Digimon that's red or has [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, this Digimon gains <Blocker> (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead).

cards.name: RaijiLudomon
cards.effect1: [Opponent's Turn] This Digimon can't be deleted by your opponent's effects.
cards.effect2: [End of Your Turn] You may DNA digivolve this Digimon and one of your other Digimon in play into a Digimon card in your hand by paying its DNA digivolve cost.

cards.name: BryweLudramon
cards.effect1:
[Your Turn] (Once Per Turn)  When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, your opponent's effects can't delete this Digimon or return it to its owner's hand or deck until the end of your opponent's turn.
[When Digivolving] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less among them without paying its memory cost. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
cards.effect2: [Opponent's Turn] While this Digimon is [RagnaLoardmon], it isn't affected by the effects of your opponent's Digimon.
ruling: Q: If this Digimon is underneath a suspended [RagnaLoardmon] and is targeted for the effect of [BT3-057 MegaGargomon], does this card unsuspend during the next unsuspend Phase?
A: No, even though the Digimon is unaffected by the effects they have been applied and during your unsuspend phase it is no longer unaffected by your opponent's Digimon effects.

cards.name: Direct Smasher
cards.jpname: ディレクトスマッシャー
cards.effect1:
While you have a Digimon with [Legend-Arms] in its traits in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.
[Main] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with the highest DP.

cards.name: Legend-Arms Alliance
cards.effect1:
[Main] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your Battle Area.
[Main] <Delay> (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)
・Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Place those cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.
cards.effect2: [Security] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Legend-Arms] in its traits and a play cost of 7 or less in your hand without paying its memory cost. Then, place this card in your battle area.
